about_the_game:
GAZOLINAS is a new indie arcade racing game with a focus on physics, speed and competition. Forget road traffic rules – in GAZOLINAS, you'll be literally flying at half of a Mach speeds while collecting Drift Points and listening to catchy Drum and Bass music.

In this demo you will be able to tune and drive one of the four cars: Rossa. A nimble German sedan with a morbid craving for oversteer.
You can drive, drift and everything else on two of the environments:
  • "Euro Burgern Ring", an european 10+km length racetrack with lots of turns and straight lines
  • "Donut City" racetrack containing multiple courses for racing and drifting

The DEMO Leaderboards are separate from the main game and the saved experience, level, credits, unlocked paint colors will not transfer to the full version of the game once purchased

GAZOLINAS is a new indie arcade racing game with a focus on physics, speed and competition. Forget road traffic rules – in GAZOLINAS, you'll be literally flying at half of a Mach speeds while collecting Drift Points and listening to catchy Drum and Bass music.

In this demo you will be able to tune and drive one of the four cars: Rossa. A nimble German sedan with a morbid craving for oversteer.
You can drive, drift and everything else on two of the environments:

  • "Donut City" racetrack containing multiple courses for racing and drifting

The DEMO Leaderboards are separate from the main game and the saved experience, level, credits, unlocked paint colors will not transfer to the full version of the game once purchased
name: GAZOLINAS Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Capable Video Card AMD/Intel/nVidia with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Capable Video Card AMD/Intel/nVidia with 8GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Experience GAZOLINAS: an indie arcade racer blending physics, speed, and competition. Fly through tracks, collecting Drift Points while listening to catchy beats. Try the DEMO with Rossa, a German sedan on "Euro Burgern Ring" and "Donut City" tracks. Compete on leaderboards!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Japanese*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*
*languages with full audio support
